allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: cleanup filesystem and fix provider bugs

- Remove duplicate .env files \(9 â†’ 2\)
- Remove orphan app/ directory with voice files
- Remove dead deploy/ and docs/ directories
- Fix duplicate capabilities\(\) methods in providers
- Fix LMStudio stream_completion ChatMessage bug
- Fix OpenAI compat STT capability flag
- Update docker-compose.yml as single source of truth
- Add psycopg2-binary for PostgreSQL support

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: cleanup static site, remove Docker/Node artifacts

- Remove all Docker files \(static site doesn''t need Docker\)
- Remove docker-compose files \(backend handles its own\)
- Remove node_modules and package.json \(static site\)
- Remove monitoring configs \(belongs in backend\)
- Remove test/diagnostic HTML files
- Remove summary markdown files
- Keep only essential static assets: HTML, JS, CSS, icons

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: full stack docker-compose with PostgreSQL and Redis

- PostgreSQL 16 and Redis 7 now start by default
- Backend depends on healthy postgres and redis
- Ngrok tunnel available via --profile tunnel
- All services use internal network only
- Persistent volumes for data

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
